_header: Who that this book will understand
_description: A prayer tag added to a copy of the Mirror of Simple Souls — five lines

BLAdd37790.Transcription:
Who that this booke will vnderstaundeTake þat lorde to his
                    Spouse louandeThat is god in TriniteIhesu mercy and graceMarie
                    Pray ffor vs
BLAdd37790.Editions:
Catalogue of additions to the manuscripts in the British Museum in the
                years MDCCCCVI-MDCCCCX….
         [London]: the Trustees of the British Museum, 1912: 155.
